contents:
如果你有Social Security Number，那么一切都好办，去到任何一个支行柜台办理账户就行。
如果你没有Social Security Number，那就麻烦了，你需要：


  • verify your source of income;

  • verify your place of residence;

  • verify your identity;

  • obtaining an ITIN (Individual Taxpayer Identification Number);

  • For a business, you must obtain and provide an EIN (Employer Identification Number)
